dialogues.speaker: Professor Oak
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Pokémon! I'm Professor Oak, a renowned Pokémon researcher. I've been studying these fascinating creatures for many years.

dialogues.speaker: Young Trainer
dialogues.text: Wow, it's an honor to meet you, Professor! I'm so excited to start my own Pokémon journey!

dialogues.speaker: Professor Oak
dialogues.text: Ah, enthusiasm is wonderful! I'm glad to see that. As a Pokémon researcher, I've been studying the different species of Pokémon and their habitats.

dialogues.speaker: Professor Oak
dialogues.text: Now, let me give you a Pokédex, a high-tech encyclopedia that records information on all the Pokémon you'll encounter on your journey!
